title: Support forum and red posts
body: I'm just wondering is this subsection of the forums meant for community support or do people actually get help from the Riot team regarding their issues? Having a quick browse through the last couple of pages of post I found that more than a few people had some pretty valid issues and I don't think I even saw one response from a Riot team member.

replies.body:
Well, I've been here since basically the boards went up (it wasn't even a year ago though, there are some much older forum vets that are still a bit active). Not often at all I've seen red activity. I would go as far as to say they treat this board as voodoo lands.

On that note, not many people actually reply/participate in discussions in general. They just come, make a new discussion about their personal problem, and then leave when it's been solved.

As for what to expect from here, you'll really only get community support, and by community support I mean people also saying, "I'm getting that as well, how fix?!"

Call me pessimistic.
